attributes.action: Remove Honours Titles of Sebastian Coe & Bradley Wiggins
attributes.additional_details: In action of recent Parliamentary findings relating to Coe & Wiggins, we need to reset the bar - and show that we do not want their type of "Fair Play"
attributes.background: Nullify Titles of Bradley Wiggins & Sebastian Coe

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
